page.title: 20LIFE ON A FARM
page.content: I live on a small farm about five miles outside Limavady. Every morning my father gets up at 7.00 to feed the animals. We have pigs, cows and hens. My father also works as a builder during the rest of the day. At that time my mother feeds the hens and brings in the eggs. From May the piglets are born and my brother and I take turns to watch them at night. In the winter we bring hay to the cattle in the sheds, I find this very hard work. At the end of our day's work it is back to feeding the animals before homework and bed.
